title: Smart PDF Extraction System
subtitle: AI-powered real estate project information extraction and structuring

checklist.title: Pre-submission Checklist
checklist.subtitle: Please carefully review the following information to ensure accuracy

invalidUnits.title: Found {{count}} invalid unit types
invalidUnits.desc: The following unit types are missing area information (AI extraction failed), they will be automatically filtered on submission
invalidUnits.hint: Tip: You can manually delete these unit types, or re-upload the PDF after fixing

checklist.basicInfoDesc: Please check project name, developer, address, etc.
checklist.mapSetHint: Please click "Select Map Location" to set project coordinates
checklist.unitTypesDesc: Please check area, price, images for each unit type
checklist.confirmReview: I have carefully reviewed all information and confirm it is correct
checklist.checkToSubmit: Check this box to submit the project

overlay.pleaseWait: This may take a moment, please wait

confirm.successAlert:
Project submitted successfully!
Redirecting to map page...

processing.extractComplete: Extraction complete! Please check and edit the form below
processing.checkFormAndSubmit: Please check the form on the right, edit and submit

documentUpload.supportInfo: Ctrl+click to select multiple files, max 20MB each

multiDocUpload.title: Document Upload (multiple supported)
multiDocUpload.supportInfo: Support multiple PDFs, AI will merge and analyze all documents

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.subtitle: Core project information

dateProgress.title: Dates & Progress

dateProgress.handoverDateHint: Date when owners can take possession
